title: Rwanda - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Rwanda stands at B+ with negative outlook. Moody's credit rating for Rwanda was last set at B2 with negative outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Rwanda was last reported at B+ with negative outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Rwanda thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Rwanda as reported by major credit rating agencies.
